// Register slice conforming to Comportibility guide.


module prim_subreg_ext #(


  parameter int unsigned DW = 32


) (


  input          re,


  input          we,


  input [DW-1:0] wd,




  input [DW-1:0] d,




  // output to HW and Reg Read


  output logic          qe,


  output logic          qre,


  output logic [DW-1:0] q,


  output logic [DW-1:0] qs


);




  assign qs = d;


  assign q = wd;


  assign qe = we;


  assign qre = re;




endmodule
